title: Aural set, Symph 93 - role of bassoon

content.question: Which of the following best describes the role of the bassoon at the beginning of section 2 ?

choices.label: It provides a walking bass line.
It imitates the melody at the fifth.
It doubles the melody at the octave.

content.answer: It doubles the melody at the octave.

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Use symbols and terms to describe melodic, harmonic, and rhythmic relationships in performed music. (This skill is applied in describing these elements in a full musical context.)
